SQLs.SQL: select jg.dizhimc 地区名称 ,jg.dizhibm ,info.* from ( select dizhibm,dizhimc from GY_FUWUJG group by dizhibm,dizhimc ) jg left join ( select subjg.dizhibm, sum(case when (h.highrisktype like concat('%',01,'%') or h.highrisktype like concat('%',18,'%'))then 1 else 0 end) 早产 , sum(case when g.birthWeight < '1500' then 1 else 0 end) 极低出生体重儿, sum(case when h.highrisktype like concat('%',02,'%')then 1 else 0 end) 足月小样儿, sum(case when h.highrisktype like concat('%',06,'%')then 1 else 0 end) HIE, sum(case when h.highrisktype like concat('%',07,'%')then 1 else 0 end) 颅内出血, sum(case when (h.highrisktype like concat('%',09,'%') or h.highrisktype like concat('%',10,'%'))then 1 else 0 end) 其他惊厥, sum(case when h.highrisktype like concat('%',04,'%')then 1 else 0 end) 呼吸系统RDS, sum(case when h.highrisktype like concat('%',03,'%')then 1 else 0 end) 高胆红素血症, sum(case when h.highrisktype like concat('%',17,'%')then 1 else 0 end) 其它, count(*) 本季总数, sum(case when h.endmanage = 1 then 1 else 0 end) 管理率 from cc_highrisk h left join cc_generalinfo g on h.childid = g.childid left join GY_FUWUJG subjg on g.manaunitid = subjg.fuwujgbh where h.status = 1 and h.registerdate >= @登记日期Start and h.registerdate < dateadd(day,1,@登记日期End) and subjg.dizhibm in ( select dizhibm from GY_FUWUJG group by dizhibm,dizhimc ) group by dizhibm ) info on jg.dizhibm = info.dizhibm

select jg.dizhimc 地区名称 ,jg.dizhibm ,hc.* from ( select dizhibm,dizhimc from GY_FUWUJG group by dizhibm,dizhimc ) jg left join ( select subjg.dizhibm, count(*) 活产数 from cdh_newbornrecord nr left join cdh_deliveryrecord dr on nr.chanshibh = dr.chanshibh left join GY_FUWUJG subjg on dr.visitunitcode = subjg.fuwujgbh where nr.outcomeofbirth = 1 and nr.tianbiaosj >= @登记日期Start and nr.tianbiaosj < dateadd(day,1,@登记日期End) and subjg.dizhibm in ( select dizhibm from GY_FUWUJG group by dizhibm,dizhimc ) group by subjg.dizhibm ) hc on jg.dizhibm = hc.dizhibm

select jg.dizhimc 地区名称 ,jg.dizhibm ,za.* from ( select dizhibm,dizhimc from GY_FUWUJG group by dizhibm,dizhimc ) jg left join ( select subjg.dizhibm, count(*) 应管人数, sum(case when h.endmanage = 1 then 1 else 0 end) 总管理人数 from cc_highrisk h left join cc_generalinfo g on h.childid = g.childid left join GY_FUWUJG subjg on g.manaunitid = subjg.fuwujgbh where h.status = 1 and h.registerdate >= @登记日期Start and h.registerdate < dateadd(day,1,@登记日期End) and subjg.dizhibm in ( select dizhibm from GY_FUWUJG group by dizhibm,dizhimc ) group by subjg.dizhibm ) za on jg.dizhibm = za.dizhibm
select u.name,jg.FuWuJGMC from [User] u left join GY_FUWUJG jg on u.organization = jg.FUWUJGBH where job_no = @jobno
